sentences.sContent: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.sCn: 这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

sentences.sContent: And he was so lovely. He robbed my breath with his pale beauty. This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: And he was so lovely. He robbed my breath with his pale beauty. This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.sCn: 他太可爱了。他苍白的小样子喜欢得我无法呼吸了。这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

trans.tranCn: 小孩, 娃娃, 宝宝
